item.title: 3D C++ Renderer
item.description: A 3D renderer written in C++.

item.title: Puzzle Game
item.description: A game where you push blocks around and use the power of mathematics to interact with the world around you and solve puzzles. Play demo here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/114WXCk3p4rPQgUeSWNGvWN9G4C0QcTwZ/view?usp=sharing Click read more for more detailed information about the game and engine.

item.title: Compiler
item.description: A compiler project for fun. Source: https://github.com/JoshuaManton/lang. Demo: https://github.com/JoshuaManton/lang/blob/master/demo.lang Click read more for more detailed information about the compiler.

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Joshua Manton and I am a software developer living in Victoria, British Columbia. I started programming as a hobby in 2010 tinkering with Unity3D and it quickly became a passion, leading me to attend Camosun College in the Computer Systems Technology program after high school in 2014. As of 2020 I’ve been working professionally as a programmer for 4 years, working on competitive multiplayer mobile games, casual games, an augmented reality amusement park ride, and other location-based entertainment.
